segments.text: I would like to register for a class today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , what class would you like to take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would very much enjoy taking a Psychology class.Because I'm crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are two classes that are still open .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which days are these classes on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The first class is a Tuesday and Thursday class from two to three .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The other class is on Monday and Wednesday from 10 am - 12 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure there are no more open classes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sign me up for Monday and Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1
